data.name: Conference in the Cloud
data.description: COVID-19 has kept us all home. However we still have great things to share about Perl and Raku. Join us for a 3 day event including interactive talks and forums.

relatedRecords.name: Open Source Community Conference(OSCONF) 2020 Pune
relatedRecords.description: OSCONF is a platform built to connect & bring all leading Meetup communities, Cloud native experts, Evangelists & DevOps together under one roof. It is a non-profit community event which allows you to interact with community leaders, ambassadors & open community contributors.
